title: Create a channel, add a member, and post a message to the channel on Mattermost
description:
This is an example that creates a channel, adds a member, and posts a message to the channel on Mattermost.

You can refer to the [documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.mattermost/#mattermost) to learn how to build this workflow from scratch.
